title: Presumptions
context: ยง490:1-206 Presumptions. Whenever this chapter creates a &ldquo;presumption&rdquo; with respect to a fact, or provides that a fact is &ldquo;presumed&rdquo;, the trier of fact shall find the existence of the fact unless evidence is introduced that supports a finding of its nonexistence. [L 2004, c 162, pt of ยง1]
